thread.title: Mohanlal Ticks One Of His Bucket List!
thread.title_full: Mohanlal Ticks One Of His Bucket List!

title: Mohanlal Ticks One Of His Bucket List!
text:
Â» Mohanlal Ticks One Of His Bucket List! Mohanlal Ticks One Of His Bucket List! Recently, Mohanlal fulfilled his one of his bucket list wishes in a very unique way. Read on to know how.... Updated:  42   
Mohanlal, the complete actor has always been in the headlines not only for his exceptional talent but also for his peculiar lifestyle. Recently, Mohanlal fulfilled his longtime bucket list wish, to the much surprise of his fans. 
As per the report published by Kerala Kaumudi daily, the actor recently travelled around the Trivandrum city by 4.30 AM by a bicycle. It was Mohanlal's longtime wish to travel around his favourite city by bicycle. 
Reportedly, the actor chose the early morning time for the bicycle journey, to avoid the public attention. Even though he hails from Elanthoor, Pathanamthitta, Mohanlal grew up in Mudavanmukal, Trivandrum city.
